name: Bumbling About
description:
Welcome to Bumbling About.!

Your goal is to collect all the pollen by getting all of the flowers as fast as possible!

[Controls]

-Used WASD or Left Stick to move.

-Use the Mouse or Right Stick to tilt the camera.

-Use Space or or the South Button to Jump

-Hold down Shift or Left Stick while Running and Jumping to do a Long Jump.

AND MOST IMPORTANTLY:

Hold down the jump button MID-AIR to Fly!

[NOTE]

This game was made for the 2022 Great Spring Game Jam. The majority of it was made within a single week.

Some sound effects from https://www.kenney.nl/

Fonts from Google Fonts

& Shadow Decal Shader from https://github.com/Master-J/DecalCo

PS. I didn't have time to add music, so you can listen to whatever while you play.

(I recommend "The Honeyhive" by Mahito Yokota and Koji Kondo. For no particular reason of course)
